task.title: Momma's Skillet-Cooked Bacon
task.shortdesc: This recipe is for bacon, which are thin strips of salted and smoked meat from the sides and back of a pig.

taskbody.prereq:
Beautiful, Brown Bacon
You will need the following ingredient:
8 ounces of bacon
taskbody.context: This recipe is adapted from the Food Network cookbook How to Boil Water: Life Beyond Takeout.

step.cmd: Separate the strips of bacon and lay them in a single layer in a skillet
Set the pan over medium heat and cook until the bacon shrivels some and browns on the bottom for about 3 minutes
Turn the strips over and rotate them from the outside of the pan to the inside
Cook on the other side for about 6 minutes for the ultimate crisp-factor
Drain cooked bacon on a plate lined with paper towels
Serve hot or at room temperature and enjoy!
